description: React functional component 'TemplateSelect' responsible for rendering a UI that lists templates, allows previewing a template in a modal, and selecting a template. It dynamically imports a '../templates' module to fetch and display templates.

methods.name: TemplateSelect({ selected, onChange })
methods.description: Main React component that displays template options, handles preview modal, and selection logic.

methods.name: openPreview
methods.description: Asynchronously loads template schema and sets it for preview display.
